categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: Irontrees were a type of tree native to Mustafar, notably found within the forest of Corvax Fen. Many had been planted by the Alazmec of Winsit, in a vain attempt to replenish Mustafar's ecosystem. Most of the trees had died off due to the planet's harsh condition. By 35 ABY, when Supreme Leader Kylo Ren arrived on Mustafar to retrieve the Sith wayfinder which belonged to his grandfather Darth Vader, several irontrees were on his way to Fortress Vader as he fought against the Alazmec of Winsit.

Irontrees first appeared in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, the third and final installment of the Star Wars sequel trilogy. They were first identified in the accompanying reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary.

In the 2020 art book The Art of Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker, co-production designer Kevin Jenkins stated that the irontrees were planted twenty or thirty years prior in comparison to the one hundred years that big trees needed to grow, placing the irontrees' plantation around 15 ABY or 5 ABY.
